intro: Schmaltzia schmidelioides var. potosinensis, commonly known as the Potosí Schmaltzia, is a flowering plant native to the Andean region of South America. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in gardens, though it remains relatively rare in horticultural trade.
